entry.title: China Seeks First Military Base on Africa's Atlantic Coast
entry.content: Classified American intelligence reports suggest China intends to establish a military installation in Equatorial Guinea, a move that would give Beijing its first permanent naval presence on the Atlantic Ocean, according to U.S. officials.

entry.title: Omicron's Spread Exposes South Africa's Vaccination Struggles
entry.content: South Africaâ€™s struggles to vaccinate more than a quarter of its population have left many of its 60 million people potentially exposed as the new Omicron variant spreads across the country.
